channel.title: Distributeds on Alireza's Mindmap

item.title: Concurrency vs Parallelism
item.description: Differentiating concurrency and parallelism is confusing without understanding the underlying concepts first. This article aims to give you a pretty good understanding of the core concepts of concurrency, how it is handled by different programming languages, and gives some generic guidelines on when to use which.
